item.description:
Remember these songs?

* Rikki Don't Lose That Number

* Reelin' in the Years

* Kid Charlemagne

* Pretzel Logic

* Peg

'No Static' is an excellent Steely Dan cover band playing at Johnny D's in Somerville on Friday, April 13th.  The show starts at 10:00pm. 

There is a cash cover charge ($10-$15) at the door. Come out and join us for this fun show!

﻿Some of us are meeting at 8:45 for dinner. The tables are full as of Thursday, but please text me at 617-877-5843 if you get there early so we can all "meet up".

 

Click here to listen to these terrific Steely Dan tunes:

http://www.last.fm/music/Steely+Dan/Greatest+Hits

 

If you have any questions, or are interested in getting a table for dinner before the show, please contact Karen at kebritton@comcast.net.
item.name: We'll be 'Reelin' in the Years'...!
